类 AdminAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
      • com.onlymvp.action.AdminAction
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    com.opensymphony.xwork2.Action, com.opensymphony.xwork2.LocaleProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ModelDriven<AdminInfoEntity>, com.opensymphony.xwork2.TextProvider, com.opensymphony.xwork2.Validateable, com.opensymphony.xwork2.ValidationAware, java.io.Serializable, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware

    public class AdminAction
extends com.opensymphony.xwork2.ActionSupport
implements com.opensymphony.xwork2.ModelDriven<AdminInfoEntity>, org.apache.struts2.interceptor.ServletRequestAware
    管理员管理访问控制器 提供EasyUI访问接口并返回Json数据
    作者:
    http://onlymvp.com , 微信订阅号:stuhelp
